region.label: AWS Region Name
region.description: Specify the region the data source is located in.

help.label: Need additional help?
help.description: More details on the data source setting can be found in the specified link

detector_ids.label: Detector Ids
detector_ids.description: Specify one or more detectors ids of the GuardDuty separated by comma. Example: DetectorId1,DetectorId2

aws_access_key_id.label: AWS access key ID
aws_access_key_id.description: AWS Access Key ID is required for both AWS key-based and role-based authentication

aws_iam_role.label: AWS IAM role
aws_iam_role.description: AWS IAM Role is required for only AWS role-based authentication

aws_secret_access_key.label: AWS secret access key
aws_secret_access_key.description: AWS Secret Access Key ID is required for both AWS key-based and role-based authentication
